mapper.select: SELECT p.payment_no paymentNo , a.customer_mail customerMail , a.address_detail addressDetail , p.payment_price paymentPrice , p.payment_method paymentMethod , p.payment_state paymentState FROM payment p LEFT OUTER JOIN address a ON p.address_no = a.address_no;
mapper.update: UPDATE payment SET payment_state = '배송중' WHERE payment_no = ${paymentNo};
